statements: DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND supplier_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE eco_friendly_products = TRUE;
DELETE FROM product WHERE price < 50.00 AND is_sustainable = true;
DELETE FROM product WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM supplier WHERE location = 'New York' OR is_eco_friendly = TRUE;
DELETE FROM product_sources WHERE source_name = 'Supplier A'
DELETE FROM product_sources WHERE product_id = 5 AND sustainability_certification = 'organic';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Green Suppliers' AND supplier_location = 'Earth';
